strategy: Yme-Loc Eldar armies have a strategy rating of 4.
initiative: Aspect Warrior formations, Titans and the Avatar have an initiative rating of 1+. All other formations have an initiative rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Biel Tan, a Eldar Craftworld.

formations.name: 0-1 Wraithgate
formations.units: Replace one objective marker in the Eldar players half of the table with a Wraithgate, this counts as an objective marker and a webway portal which may not be attacked or damaged in any way.

sections.name: Yme-Loc Titans
sections.description: Choose one Yme-Loc Titan for the army. Max 1 for each 3k points

formations.name: Phantom Titan
formations.units: One Yme-Loc Phantom Titan or One Fir Iolarion Phantom Titan

sections.name: Yme-Loc Scout Titans
sections.description: Up to one Scout Titan for each 1000 points.

formations.name: Revenant Titan
upgrades: Add one addtional Revenant Titan for 250 points

sections.name: Yme-Loc Support
sections.description: Up to two supports for each Scout Titan Taken.

sections.name: Eldar Navy
sections.description: Up to one formation for each 1500 points.

upgrades.title: Yme-Loc Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per Formation

items.name: Bone Singer
items.description: Add 1 Bone Singer to the a unit in the formation.
